remarks: Version of ~ bj-ceqsalg with a dv condition on ` x , V ` , removing dependency on ~ df-sb and ~ df-clab .  Prefer its use over ~ bj-ceqsalg when sufficient (in particular when ` V ` is substituted for ` _V ` ). (Contributed by BJ, 12-Oct-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
bj-ceqsalgv.1 $e |- F/ x ps $.
bj-ceqsalgv.2 $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
bj-ceqsalgv $p |- ( A e. V -> ( A. x ( x = A -> ph ) <-> ps ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d V x $.
